cause.description:
Our Goal is to bring back the best beer in the world...Steinhoff. It was discontinued after years of my allegiance and I want it back...not only was it the best beer ever it was also best value for money beer in the world!SHAME ON YOU CAVERSHAM ROAD SUPER SHOP...aka...da cida shop!!! If any one has spotted these badboys in any shops nation wide please join this cause and leave details...thank you...and god bless you!
1. Steinhoff must come back
2. Has to be sold in Reading
3. Has to be 75p a can
cause.name: Bring back Steinhoff Pills!
